entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
